content: for this pattern the boat is worked in yarn bee super bulky burnt autumn i-love-this-yarn shades dark brown and white are also used the stitches used are single slip_stitch chain increase and decrease double back loop only front loop only if you are absolutely smitten with the cuteness of this little project you may want to check out my sailor mouse pattern where you can purchase a little sailor mouse to go with the boat the sailor mouse pattern can be viewed here 1 in my store in the mouse series bundle it s available for purchase at one dollar i would love to see a picture of your little boat please make a project and give feedback enjoy 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sailor-mouse
